text: Sore kara madoyan no mizuba ni kite miru to, kare wa ichigun no hitobito ga (sono kachiku ni) mizu o yatte iru no o mita. Mata, kare-ra no katasumi ni, 2-ri no fujin ga (kenmei ni kachiku o suiba ni kin yora semai to shite) koho ni hikaete iru no o mikaketa.
